item.title: 美国比特币交易所交易基金流出55亿美元，创最长流出记录
item.description: 美国比特币交易所交易基金创下自去年1月上市以来最长的周度净流出记录，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策推动了更多投资者从高风险资产中撤出。【原文：US Bitcoin exchange-traded funds recorded their longest run of weekly net outflows since listing in January last year as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs drove a wider retreat from riskier assets.】

item.title: 英伟达投资者期待首席执行官主题演讲继续反弹
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）的股东们希望公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）的主题演讲能带来足够的乐观情绪，以帮助维持该股近期的反弹。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shareholders are hoping that a keynote speech from chief executive Jensen Huang can deliver enough optimism to help sustain the stock’s recent rebound.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战使世界经济增长放缓、通胀加剧
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普咄咄逼人的贸易政策使世界突然走上了增长放缓和通胀上升的道路，如果紧张局势升级，情况可能会明显恶化。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s aggressive trade policies have abruptly set the world onto a path of slower growth and higher inflation that could worsen notably if tensions escalate, the OECD said.】

item.title: 科技巨头有望在 DeepSeek 之后掀起人工智能消费热潮
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，到下个十年初，最大的科技公司在人工智能方面的年支出总额将增至 5000 亿美元以上，部分原因是 DeepSeek 和 OpenAI 采用了更新的人工智能方法。【原文：The biggest tech firms will ramp up their combined annual spending on artificial intelligence to more than $500 billion by early next decade, driven in part by a newer approach to AI from DeepSeek and OpenAI, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 据说 Converge ICT 考虑分拆光纤业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，菲律宾宽带运营商 Converge ICT Solutions 公司正在考虑将其光纤业务分割出去，然后出售该业务 40% 的股份。【原文：Philippine broadband operator Converge ICT Solutions Inc. is considering carving out its fiber operations and then selling a 40% stake in that business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本 40 年期收益率升至创纪录水平，石破支持率下降
item.description: 周一，对日本首相石破茂政府支持率下滑的担忧加重了日本国债的压力，使 40 年期国债收益率短暂升至 3% 的历史新高。【原文：Concerns about slumping support for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s administration added to pressure on Japanese government bonds on Monday, helping send the 40-year yield briefly to an all-time high of 3%.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数大幅下挫后，期权市场发出稳定信号
item.description: 在美国 500 指数（S&P 500 Index）陷入有史以来最剧烈的一次调整之后，一个稳定的迹象正在显现：交易员们放弃了对未来将再次大幅下跌的押注。【原文：A sign of stability is emerging after the S&P 500 Index plunged into one of its sharpest-ever corrections: Traders are ditching bets that another deep slide is ahead.】

item.title: 以色列与阿塞拜疆签署天然气勘探协议，加强联盟关系
item.description: 阿塞拜疆将于周一签署在以色列水域勘探天然气的协议，这凸显了两国在该地区动荡局势中的重要战略联盟关系。【原文：Azerbaijan will on Monday sign agreements to explore for natural gas in Israeli waters, highlighting a key strategic alliance between the two countries amid turbulence in the region.】

item.title: 印度贸易逆差缩小，但关税风险依然存在
item.description: 在全球不确定性增加的情况下，印度上个月的贸易逆差大幅缩小，进出口均有所下降。【原文：India’s trade gap narrowed sharply last month as imports and exports declined amid rising global uncertainty.】

item.title: 据说液晶面板制造商 CVTE 考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，电子元件制造商广州世源电子科技有限公司正在考虑在香港第二次上市，这将为香港的此类股票销售热潮再添一把火。【原文：Electronic components maker Guangzhou Shiyuan Electronic Technology Co. is considering a second listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a flurry of such share sales in the city.】

item.title: 货币基金经理在授权争夺战中面临新考验
item.description: 理财经理们正在努力适应不断变化的政治现实，在这种情况下，他们所觊觎的业务会附带很多新的条件。【原文：Money managers are struggling to adapt to an evolving political reality in which the business they covet comes with a lot of new strings attached.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯认为服务业通胀趋于低位
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）在接受 Onda Cero 电台采访时表示，服务业通胀正在放缓。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos sees services inflation moderating, according to a radio interview with Onda Cero.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行策略师与其他同行一道缓和对美国股市的展望
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）加入了一系列下调美国股市 2025 年预期的经纪商行列，原因是盈利预测暗淡、经济可能放缓以及贸易战带来的不确定性不断增加。【原文：RBC Capital Markets joined a series of brokers lowering their 2025 expectations for the US stock market amid darkening earnings forecasts, a possible economic slowdown and mounting uncertainty from trade wars.】

item.title: Maynilad 申请可能成为菲律宾最大的 IPO
item.description: 菲律宾公用事业公司 Maynilad Water Services Inc. 周一表示，该公司计划于 7 月份在马尼拉证券交易所上市，为可能成为该国有史以来规模最大的首次公开发行股票活动画上句号。【原文：Philippine utility firm Maynilad Water Services Inc. said on Monday it plans to list in Manila’s stock exchange in July to cap off a share sale that could be the country’s biggest-ever initial public offering.】

item.title: 胜科据说正在进行业务战略审查
item.description: 知情人士称，胜科工业有限公司正在对其业务进行战略审查，正在考虑各种可能性，包括可能私有化或出售部分资产。【原文：Sembcorp Industries Ltd. is carrying out a strategic review of its business, with various possibilities under consideration, including potentially going private or selling some assets, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 货币政策委员会会议召开前南非通胀预期升温
item.description: 衡量南非通胀预期的一个关键指标略有上升，为央行行长们在本周开会时谨慎降低借贷成本提供了又一个理由。【原文：A key gauge of South African inflation expectations rose slightly, providing central bankers with another reason to be cautious about lowering borrowing costs when they meet this week.】

item.title: 特朗普与普京举行停火会谈前欧洲天然气价格下滑
item.description: 由于天气预报转暖以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和俄罗斯领导人弗拉基米尔-普京计划举行会谈，该地区供应平衡的前景似乎有所改善，欧洲天然气价格下滑。【原文：European natural gas prices slipped as warming weather forecasts and planned talks between US President Donald Trump and Russian leader Vladimir Putin appeared to bolster prospects for the region’s supply balance.】

item.title: 股市反弹刺激需求，中国可转债大涨
item.description: 中国股市的亢奋情绪重创了中国的大部分债务市场，但有一个明显的例外：可转换债券。【原文：The euphoria over Chinese stocks has hammered much of the country’s debt market, with a notable exception: convertible bonds.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会主席安德鲁-弗格森谈特朗普领导下的反垄断
item.description: 当特朗普在 11 月获胜时，华尔街为之兴奋的事情之一就是预期中的兼并规则自由化。有一种流行的观点认为，在莉娜-汗的领导下，联邦贸易委员会在批准交易方面过于严格，而新政府将更多地开绿灯。但至少到目前为止，事实证明并非如此简单。还没有出现大的并购浪潮。而事实上，由新任主席安德鲁-弗格森（Andrew Ferguson）领导的联邦贸易委员会已经决定，继续保持对并购的限制。【原文：When Trump won in November, one of the things that Wall Street was excited about was an expected liberalization of merger rules. There was a popular view that under Lina Khan, the FTC was overly stringent about what deals it would let go through, and that the new administration would give the greenlight more often. But at least so far, reality hasn’t proven to be so simple. There hasn’t been a big merger wave yet. And, in fact, the FTC led by new Chair Andrew Ferguson has decided to keep the mer】

item.title: 中国跃马称可抵御芯片限制的扩大
item.description: 使用高通公司和英伟达公司芯片的电动汽车制造商浙江跃马科技股份有限公司（Zhejiang Leapmotor Technology Co.【原文：Electric vehicle maker Zhejiang Leapmotor Technology Co., which uses chips from Qualcomm Inc. and Nvidia Corp., said it would be able to ride out any escalation in US curbs on the flow of advanced chips to China.】

item.title: 泰国批准 59 亿美元项目以扩建曼谷地铁系统和数据中心网络
item.description: 泰国批准了总价值达 2,000 亿泰铢（59 亿美元）的投资申请，其中包括曼谷的一条交通线路和三个数据中心，这为泰国乏力的经济增长带来了潜在的推动力。【原文：Thailand approved investment applications worth a combined 200 billion baht ($5.9 billion), led by a Bangkok transit line and three data centers, giving a potential boost to the nation’s lackluster economic growth.】

item.title: 贸易风险持续升温，瑞银将黄金目标价上调至 3,200 美元
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）成为最新一家上调黄金价格前景的银行，原因是全球贸易战旷日持久的可能性越来越大；分析师预计，这种情况将继续推动投资者抢购更多这种终极避风港资产。【原文：UBS Group AG became the latest bank to raise its price outlook for gold on increasing chances of a protracted global trade war — a scenario that analysts expect will continue to drive investors to scoop up more of the ultimate haven asset.】

item.title: 印度邦政府机构计划出售 17 亿美元地方债券
item.description: 印度马哈拉施特拉邦的公路开发部门正计划通过本币债券筹集多达 1,500 亿卢比（17 亿美元）的资金，在中断 15 年后重返市场。【原文：The road development arm of the Indian state of Maharashtra is planning to raise as much as 150 billion rupees ($1.7 billion) through local-currency bonds, returning to the market after a 15-year hiatus.】

item.title: 伯克希尔增持日本最大贸易公司股份
item.description: 在沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）致股东的年度信函引发有关此举的猜测三周后，伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. increased its stakes in Japan’s largest trading houses, three weeks after Warren Buffett’s annual letter to shareholders spurred speculation of such move.】
